Posts.Content: This is a great Idea! I find that there is so little information about Brain diseases- and my healing process in the past 2 years has been because I have a great support care-giver who helps me find ways to help my own healing and maybe someday an understanding of this disease! We work at it everyday- it takes time and his patience but I am getting better.
Posts.Title: A new collaboration, "Patient Perspectives," to amplify patients' voices
